issues.description: Hero CTA placement may fail 8-second comprehension test without clear value proposition anchor
issues.rationale: Primary CTA lacks contextual value clarity that drives immediate action within attention span

issues.description: Pricing moved higher without risk reversal may increase abandonment at decision point
issues.rationale: Early pricing exposure without trust building creates premature price objections

issues.description: Audit log pattern may confuse non-technical users expecting simple business setup interface
issues.rationale: Technical UI patterns conflict with 48-hour launch promise for mainstream entrepreneurs

issues.description: 3-step horizontal stepper may not convey complexity of actual business launch process
issues.rationale: Oversimplified flow creates expectation gap versus real implementation effort

issues.description: Hero 60/40 split may push CTA below fold on smaller desktop screens reducing conversions
issues.rationale: Content-heavy left column risks burying primary action below 768px viewport height

issues.description: Section reordering puts proof before problem establishment reducing persuasion impact
issues.rationale: Users need pain awareness before proof resonates, violating conversion psychology sequence

issues.description: Pricing cards without clear tier progression may create decision paralysis
issues.rationale: Equal visual weight across tiers removes anchoring effect needed for choice architecture

issues.description: Problem/Solution merge may reduce emotional impact of pain point articulation
issues.rationale: Immediate solution presentation weakens pain amplification needed for motivation

issues.description: 20px body text may reduce content density causing excessive scroll on mobile devices
issues.rationale: Large text increases page length potentially losing users before conversion points

issues.description: Neutral background lacks energy that matches 48-hour launch urgency positioning
issues.rationale: Calm aesthetic conflicts with speed and momentum messaging of rapid business launch

suggestedFixes.fix: Add benefit-driven CTA copy like 'Start My 48-Hour Launch' with urgency indicator below button
suggestedFixes.rationale: Connects action to core value proposition and timeline expectation

suggestedFixes.fix: Add 'Try Free for 14 Days' above pricing cards with money-back guarantee badge
suggestedFixes.rationale: Reduces price resistance with risk-free trial and explicit reversal guarantee

suggestedFixes.fix: Replace audit log with simple progress tracker showing 'Business Setup Completed: 47%' style
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains transparency while using familiar progress metaphor for non-technical users

suggestedFixes.fix: Add realistic timeframes to each step: 'Day 1: Setup (2-4 hours)', 'Day 2: Launch (1-2 hours)'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Sets accurate expectations while maintaining 48-hour promise credibility

suggestedFixes.fix: Constrain left column to 400px max-width ensuring CTA stays above 650px viewport height
suggestedFixes.rationale: Guarantees primary action visibility across standard desktop screen sizes

suggestedFixes.fix: Reorder to: Hero → Problem/Solution → Proof bar → How it works → Pricing → Audit visibility
suggestedFixes.rationale: Establishes pain first, then proves solution works, then shows how, then converts

suggestedFixes.fix: Make middle tier 20% larger with 'Most Popular' badge and highlight border
suggestedFixes.rationale: Creates visual anchor point that guides users toward intended conversion tier

suggestedFixes.fix: Keep separate sections with transition: 'Here's the problem...' → 'LaunchBase solves this by...'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains emotional journey from frustration to relief for stronger motivation

suggestedFixes.fix: Use 18px body text on mobile, 20px desktop with tighter line-height 1.4 for density
suggestedFixes.rationale: Balances readability with content efficiency to reduce scroll fatigue

suggestedFixes.fix: Use warm white (#FEFEFE) with subtle blue accent hints to convey speed without overwhelming
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains calm usability while adding energy that supports rapid launch positioning
